A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s far too long of course but with a strong script\, solid characterisation and superb acting this is indeed the best Star Wars film since Empire Strikes Back. Carrie Fisher rightly has standout moments where she steals the whole film\, but pretty much everyone impresses\, including the very surprising addition of Laura Dern. I feel conflicted about where the film ends up but there’s so much I like\, from a vastly improved Adam Driver to writer-director Rian Johnson’s whole approach to the Jedi/Smith/Force mythos that I could watch this many times over.
